The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 18 August is 63,104 (7,273.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 August, there were 2,535 new confirmed cases (292.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 August, there were 2,448 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 4% (87 extra cases).
